title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using generative AI to accelerate database modernization with AWS DMS (DAT420)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用生成式 AI 加速 AWS DMS 数据库现代化 (DAT420)
abstract: Does the thought of modernizing your application and database architecture fill you with concern? In this code talk, learn how to overcome common migration issues and concerns that arise during modernization projects. See live coding examples to learn how to use generative AI and the AWS DMS Schema Conversion feature to successfully modernize your database.
abstract_cn: 应用程序和数据库架构的现代化是否让您感到担忧？在本次代码讲座中，了解如何克服现代化项目期间出现的常见迁移问题和顾虑。通过实时编码示例，学习如何使用生成式 AI 和 AWS DMS Schema Conversion 功能来成功实现数据库现代化。

presenter.name: Vlad Vlasceanu
presenter.title: Sr. Principal SA, Database Tech Leader
